items.desc: TriageMCP provides an open-source MCP server for static PE analysis, enabling malware triage and security analysis capabilities.
Zero-click AI vulnerability discovered in Microsoft 365 Copilot allows data exposure through malicious email attachments with hidden extraction commands.
Comprehensive threat modeling framework for cloud service providers addresses evolving security challenges in 2025 cloud environments.
CloudPEASS offers open-source cloud security assessment tool providing comprehensive security evaluations across multiple cloud platforms.
Kubernetes Security Posture Management (KSPM) practitioner's guide provides comprehensive security implementation strategies for containerized environments.
Guardz secures $56M Series B funding to advance cybersecurity solutions for small and medium businesses through AI-powered threat detection.
Design patterns for securing LLM agents against prompt injection attacks provide layered defense strategies for AI system protection.
Efficient string processing algorithms for vowel detection demonstrate optimization techniques applicable to security pattern matching.
SHADE-Arena framework evaluates sabotage and monitoring capabilities in LLM agents, providing benchmarks for AI security assessment.
Privacy course for security professionals covers three types of data leakage and provides practical privacy protection strategies.
Trust engineering framework enables security leadership at early-stage startups by focusing on business-aligned security practices.
Integris IT expands managed security services through strategic acquisitions of TechMD and 1ntegersecurity.
CL4R1T4S repository provides system prompt transparency across major AI platforms including ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude.
CloudRec delivers open-source multi-cloud security posture management platform for comprehensive cloud environment security assessment.
Google's layered defense strategy provides comprehensive approach to mitigating prompt injection attacks in AI systems.
Bluetooth security vulnerabilities enable unauthorized microphone access, allowing attackers to conduct surveillance through compromised devices.
Security OKRs framework provides actionable guidance for security teams to establish measurable objectives and key results.
Qilin ransomware attack on NHS healthcare systems results in patient death, highlighting critical infrastructure vulnerability impacts.
XBOW secures $75M Series B funding to advance AI-powered cybersecurity solutions and autonomous threat detection capabilities.
AWS tutorial demonstrates creation and management of security team permissions in IAM Identity Center for enhanced cloud governance.
Critical vulnerabilities CVE-2025-53109 and CVE-2025-53110 discovered in Anthropic's EscapeRoute system highlight AI infrastructure security risks.
Substrate framework introduction by Daniel Miessler provides new security architecture for threat detection and incident response automation.
Sophos demonstrates AI-powered identification of cybercrime masterminds through advanced pattern recognition and behavioral analysis techniques.
Wiz releases comprehensive coding rules file providing security guidelines for safer development practices and vulnerability prevention.
Cloud Security Alliance publishes Secure Vibe Coding Guide empowering citizen developers with essential security best practices.
LevelBlue announces acquisition of Trustwave, positioning itself as the largest pure-play managed security services provider.
Wiz demonstrates fine-tuning small language models for secrets detection in code repositories, advancing automated security scanning capabilities.
Colombian Navy intercepts Starlink-powered drone narco-submarine, highlighting emerging threats in autonomous smuggling operations.
LlamaCloud services demonstrate AI-powered asset manager fund analysis capabilities through comprehensive Jupyter notebook implementation.
Analysis of Terry Smith's investment strategies and methodologies reveals consistent market outperformance through disciplined value investing.
UK regulators finalize comprehensive rules for private stock market operations, establishing framework for alternative trading venues through PISCES.
